raw_result.Analysis Notes: Links 2, 3 and 8 were not included in the top recommendations because they contain more specific or detailed information than required for this analysis - focusing on universal primary meal eligibility (Item 3) is unnecessary for a general free school meal query, and Link 8 deals with privacy notice while not directly relevant to the initial request.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Links 9 and 10 were also not included in the top recommendations because they primarily focus on making payments for school dinners and an announcement about the provision of free school meals, respectively - neither being directly related to obtaining information about council customer's needs.
